Question: Beijing Xingzhe Innovation Technology Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Beijing Xingzhe Innovation Technology Co., Ltd

Product 1

- AI-powered terminal devices showcased at CES 2024
- Accelerating efforts to expand presence in North America
- Unveiled a full lineup of more than 40 new devices and solutions powered by AI
- Showcased a pilotless flying car, an electric vertical takeoff and landing aircraft
